org.grouplens.grapht

Class Instantiators

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.grapht.Instantiators

  • public final class Instantiators
extends Object
    Utilities and methods for building and working with Instantiators.
    Since:
    0.9
    Author:
    GroupLens Research

    • Method Detail

      • ofInstance

        public static Instantiator ofInstance(Object inst)
        Create an instantiator that returns an instance.
        Parameters:
        inst - The instance to return (must be non-null).
        Returns:
        An instantiator that returns inst.

      • ofNull

        public static Instantiator ofNull(Class<?> type)
        Create an instantiator that returns a null value.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of null value to return.
        Returns:
        An instantiator that returns null.

      • ofProvider

        public static Instantiator ofProvider(javax.inject.Provider<?> provider)
        Convert a providerInstantiator to an instantiator. Any exception thrown by the provider - including a runtime exception - is wrapped in an ConstructionException.
        Parameters:
        provider - The providerInstantiator to wrap.
        Returns:
        An instantiator wrapping providerInstantiator.

      • ofProviderInstantiator

        public static Instantiator ofProviderInstantiator(Instantiator pinst)
        Flatten an instnatiator of providers into an instantiator of the provided type. Any exception thrown by the provider - including a runtime exception - is wrapped in an ConstructionException.
        Parameters:
        pinst - The providerInstantiator instantiator to wrap.
        Returns:
        An instantiator wrapping providerInstantiator.

      • toProvider

        public static javax.inject.Provider<?> toProvider(Instantiator instantiator)
        Convert an instantiator to a provider.
        Parameters:
        instantiator - The instantiator to convert.
        Returns:
        A provider whose Provider.get() method invokes the instantiator.

      • memoize

        public static Instantiator memoize(Instantiator instantiator)
        Memoize an instantiator.
        Parameters:
        instantiator - The instantiator to memoize.
        Returns:
        An instantiator that memoizes instantiator.
